class defectdetector.detector.Detector

Bases: object

detect(frame)
class defectdetector.detector.YoloxDetector

Bases: Detector

Get the detection results of Yolox and display the defect classification and score.

model

Path of the model.

Type

str

confidence

A threshold used to filter boxes by score.

Type

float

nms

A threshold used in non-maximum suppression.

Type

float

classes

All categories of defects.

Type

tuple

backends

Specific computation backend supported by network.

Type

list

targets

Target identifier of the specific target device used for computations.

Type

list

model_net

An instance of the Yolox class.

Type

yolox.YoloX

detect(input)
Parameters

input (ndarray) -- Input image.

Returns

Output image with defect information.

Return type

img(ndarray)

static letterbox(srcimg, target_size=(640, 640))

Scale the image and get the scaling ratio.

Parameters

  • srcimg (ndarray) -- Input image.

  • target_size (tuple) -- Input Size.

Returns

Scaled image. ratio(float): Scaling ratio.

Return type

padded_img(ndarray)

static paint_chinese_opencv(img, text, left, top, textColor=(0, 255, 0), textSize=20)

Display and add Chinese characters on the image

Parameters

  • img (ndarray) -- Images that need to add Chinese characters.

  • text (str) -- Text to be added.

  • left (int) -- The coordinates of the text, left.

  • top (int) -- The coordinates of the text, top.

  • textColor (tuple) -- Color of text.

  • textSize (int) -- Font size of text.

Returns

Image with text added

Return type

ndarray

static unletterbox(bbox, letterbox_scale)
vis(dets, srcimg, letterbox_scale, fps=None)

Visualize all defect information.

Parameters

  • dets (ndarray) -- Output of the Yolox model.

  • srcimg (ndarray) -- Input image.

  • letterbox_scale (float) -- Scaling ratio.

  • fps -- The fps.

Returns

Image containing defect information.

Return type

res_img(ndarray)
